Zhao Qi (100s-201), courtesy name Binqing, was an official and scholar who lived during the Eastern Han dynasty of China. He wrote the Commentaries on Mencius (), one of the few major commentaries on Mencius from that period still in existence.
See also
* Lists of people of the Three Kingdoms

* Fan, Ye (5th century). Book of the Later Han (Houhanshu).
